09-26-2024: - Gun cycle time increased from 0.19s to 0.22s (same overall dps)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Stake|Size=20}} Stake: distance enemies are allowed to move increased from 6m to 8m
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight ending if you touch the ground
- Low HP indication now also shows up while unscoped
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate Base damage reduced from 160 to 140
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate zoom level reduced a little bit
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight duration spirit scaling reduced from 0.2 to 0.15
09-19-2024: - Fixed some recent bugs with {{HeroIcon|Hero=Vindicta|Size=20}} Vindicta {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight that could cause some large bursts in a direction
- Fixed being able to shoot while using {{ItemIcon|Item=Ethereal Shift|Size=20}} Ethereal Shift and flying with {{HeroIcon|Hero=Vindicta|Size=20}} Vindicta
09-17-2024: - Fixed {{HeroIcon|Hero=Grey Talon|Size=20}} Grey Talon's Charge Shot and {{HeroIcon|Hero=Vindicta|Size=20}} Vindicta's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate cameras not working properly
09-12-2024: - Base bullet damage reduced from 14 to 13
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Stake|Size=20}} Stake T1 duration reduced from +0.75s to +0.5s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate bonus gold is now shared with assisters
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20}} Crow Familiar now reduces bullet armor by 6%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20}} Crow Familiar impact damage reduced from 50 to 40
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20}} Crow Familiar impact damage spirit scaling reduced from 1 to 0.8
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20}} Crow Familiar spirit power duration scaling reduced from 0.04 to 0.03
- You can now use stamina while flying to get an impulse in the facing direction
- Space bar no longer exists the ability, you have to press the key again
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate now does 20% more damage when getting a headshot
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate scope ends when you are stunned
08-29-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20}} Crow Familiar Spirit Power duration scaling reduced from 0.05 to 0.04
- Fixed left clicks sometimes deselecting the ability when charges aren't ready
08-15-2024: - Added a sound for movement being restricted by {{ItemIcon|Item=Slowing Hex|Size=20}} Slowing Hex and {{HeroIcon|Hero=Vindicta|Size=20}} Vindicta tether
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Stake|Size=20}} Stake base duration reduced from 2.5s to 2.25s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Stake|Size=20}} Stake T1 duration reduced from 1s to 0.75s
08-01-2024: - Gun damage growth increased from 0.85 to 1.0
07-11-2024: - Fixed {{HeroIcon|Hero=Vindicta|Size=20}} Vindicta's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Stake|Size=20}} Stake sometimes moving units that aren't supposed to be moved

- Fixed the following abilities changing their launch direction if the player snapped their camera quickly during the cast time: {{HeroIcon|Hero=Ivy|Size=20}} Ivy's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Kudzu Bomb|Size=20}} Kudzu Bomb, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Paradox|Size=20}} Paradox's {{AbilityIcon|Ability={{AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20}} Pulse Grenade|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20}} Pulse Grenade, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Warden|Size=20}} Warden's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20}} Alchemical Flask, {{HeroIcon|Hero=Vindicta|Size=20}} Vindicta's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Stake|Size=20}} Stake, {{ItemIcon|Item=Alchemical Fire|Size=20}} Alchemical Fire (T3 Weapon item)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20}} Crow Familiar duration spirit power scaling reduced from 0.07 to 0.05
- Gun damage growth increased from 0.7 to 0.85
06-27-2024: - Base movement speed increased from 7 to 8
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20}} Crow Familiar T1 only bouncing to 1 additional target instead of 2
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate zoom level is reduced a bit
06-20-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20}} Crow Familiar debuff duration increased from 5s to 6s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate bonus damage increased from 130 to 145
06-06-2024: - Added {{HeroIcon|Hero=Vindicta|Size=20}} Vindicta {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate sound effect for targeted players
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight spirit bonus damage reduced from +12 to +10
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight no longer has +10% bonus range to damage falloff
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight T2 changed from +12 Spirit Damage to -15s Cooldown
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight T3 changed from +3 m/s Bonus Air Speed to +12 Spirit Damage
- Can no longer melee while flying for extra movement
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate now ramps up its total damage from 50% to 100% over 1 second of being zoomed (UI indication for this)
- Fixed being unable to move while scoped in with {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Assassinate|Size=20}} Assassinate
05-30-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight no longer grants +1 bonus air speed
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight falloff damage increase reduced from +20% to +10%
- Fixed flight spirit damage being able to pierce {{ItemIcon|Item=Metal Skin|Size=20}} Metal Skin
05-23-2024: - Improved {{HeroIcon|Hero=Vindicta|Size=20}} Vindicta’s {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Stake|Size=20}} Stake effects to make it a little clearer when you are affected
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20}} Crow Familiar T3 improved from -30% Healing Suppression to -40%
05-16-2024: - {{HeroIcon|Hero=Vindicta|Size=20}} Vindicta's {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20}} Crow Familiar projectile effect indicates the radius more accurately now
- Fixed {{HeroIcon|Hero=Vindicta|Size=20}} Vindicta being able to shoot above the base wall
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight spirit bullet damage now has range effectiveness (previously the magic bullets did max damage from any range)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight spirit damage per bullet increased from 8 to 12
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight T2 bonus spirit damage per bullet increased from 8 to 12
05-03-2024: - Base Bullet Damage reduced from 15 to 14
- Bullet Damage gained per boon reduced from 0.88 to 0.7 (these are gained occasionally as you earn souls, up to 11 times)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Stake|Size=20}} Stake T1 bonus duration reduced from +1.5s to +1.0s
- Is now a recommended hero for new players
